text: The Spice Girls. Brenda Chase / Getty Images and Stuart Wilson / Getty Images There are several'90 stars that have stayed in the spotlight. Many actors of that generation are still seen on screen and singers like Mariah Carey, Britney Spears, and the fashionable Justin Timberlake seem to be on the cover of magazines or tabloids day in and day out. But what about their fellow'90s chart - toppers? While some of the 1990s greats have withdrawn from stardom and the music industry, others are still making waves as musicians. Some have even found other callings, like home improvement. Here's what all your favorite singers from the'90s are up to now.
